class_notes:
Sundays 3:00-5:30 pm - Class Dates:  2/11, 4/7, 4/14, 4/21, alternate date: 4/28


Seminar Description:  In today's world, leading inclusively isn't about being a good leader of DEI (Diversity, Equity & Inclusion), it's about being a good leader (period). This interactive, discussion-based seminar will explore the impact of leading inclusively both professionally, personally and organizationally.  Students will develop knowledge and skills around identity group dynamics, bias, psychological safety, and having difficult discussions that will leave them better prepared to shape the future.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
